titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: CHILDHOOD IMMUNISATION TYPE COMBINED (COVER HEPATITIS B SURFACE ANTIGEN POSITIVE MOTHER) - Description

div.p: CHILDHOOD IMMUNISATION TYPE COMBINED (COVER HEPATITIS B SURFACE ANTIGEN POSITIVE MOTHER) is the same as attribute CHILDHOOD IMMUNISATION TYPE COMBINED for the Cover of Vaccination Evaluated Rapidly (COVER) Data Set.

CHILDHOOD IMMUNISATION TYPE COMBINED (COVER HEPATITIS B SURFACE ANTIGEN POSITIVE MOTHER) is the type of combined childhood immunisation given to a child born to a Hepatitis B surface antigen (HBsAG) positive mother on the IMMUNISATION DATE.

entry.p: DTaP/IPV/Hib/HepB - Diphtheria, Tetanus, Pertussis, Polio, Haemophilus influenzae type b and Hepatitis B
